member.name: T:MR.Gestures.Android.DIP
member.summary: Calculator to help calculate Device Independant Pixels to real pixels.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.Android.Settings.LicenseKey
member.summary: Set the LicenseKey to the key you got when you purchased a license for this app. The license key varies with the app name.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.Android.Settings.MsUntilTapped
member.summary: Milliseconds after a Tapping event that will be waited until Tapped is raised. If a second Tapping comes within this timeframe, then DoubleTapped will be raised instead. If more than two taps come with less then this timeframe between them, neither Tapped nor DoubleTapped will be raised. It will only be indicated in TapEventArgs.NumberOfTaps in the Tapping event.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.Android.Settings.SwipeVelocityThreshold
member.summary: The velocity of a lifted finger relative to the ScaledMaximumFlingVelocity must be at least this value to count as Swipe. The default value is 0.1. Set it to a higher value if you want the user to move faster.
member.remarks: The value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
